content.raw: After trying this with a couple different urdfs, I think that this segfault completely blocks using gazebo+ros+urdf in ROS indigo. @hsu or @davetcoleman have either of you successfully spawned a urdf-based robot in gazebo 2.2 (the version that gets shipped with ros-indigo)?
content.html: After trying this with a couple different urdfs, I think that this segfault completely blocks using gazebo+ros+urdf in ROS indigo. @hsu or @davetcoleman have either of you successfully spawned a urdf-based robot in gazebo 2.2 (the version that gets shipped with ros-indigo)?
